Name: Satan's Whiskers (Curled)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: This variation on the 'Straight' Satan's Whiskers is made curly by the use of orange curaçao liqueur. It seems strangely counter-intuitive as you'd think the slightly richer Grand Marnier would be what made it curly.
History: Adapted from a recipe in Harry Craddock 's 1930 The Savoy Cocktail Book . (A variation on the classic Bronx .)
Nutrition: One serving of Satan's Whiskers (Curled) contains 139 calories
